mapper.insert: insert into csai_robot_advanced_settings (corp_id, advanced_settings, creator, create_time, updator, update_time) values (#{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{advancedSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
